doc:
Chad McQueen https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chad_McQueen 0 Chadwick Steven McQueen (born December 28, 1960) is an American actor, film producer, martial artist and race car driver. As an actor and producer, he was known for playing Dutch in The Karate Kid and The Karate Kid Part II. He is the only son of actor Steve McQueen. He has been married to Jeanie Galbraith since December 22, 1993. They have two children. He was previously married to Stacey Toten. Chadwick_Steven_McQueen ( born December_28_,_1960 ) is an_American_actor , film_producer , martial_artist_and_race_car_driver . As an_actor_and_producer , he was_known for playing Dutch in The_Karate_Kid and The_Karate_Kid_Part_II . He is the_only_son of actor_Steve_McQueen . He has_been_married to Jeanie_Galbraith since December_22_,_1993 . They have two_children . He was_previously_married to Stacey_Toten .
